price: In their hearts is a sickness[8], and Allah increased their sickness, and they will have a painful punishment for their persistent lying.
arabic: فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡذِبُونَ
footnotes: [8] The "sickness" mentioned here includes doubt, hypocrisy, arrogance and disbelief.
